email.success-note: Congratulations on your successful payment and confirmation of your reservation
email.failed-note: The reservation is confirmed or does not exist

chat-real-time.we-can-help-you: What can we do for you?

home-sections.dish-most-order-text: Summary of the most ordered dishes on Chope
home-sections.restaurant-most-score-title: The restaurant with the highest score
home-sections.restaurant-most-score-text: Summary of the highest rated restaurants on Chope

about.next-7-day: Operating time in the next 7 days
about.photo-empty-text: The restaurant has not yet updated its photos.

menu.menu-empty-text: The restaurant has not yet updated the menu on the system, sorry for the inconvenience.
menu.menu-description: Check out the menu at Restaurant #1 and discover the popular dishes people are craving! From appetizers to sweets, see what's in store for you, you can also check the price of dishes so you know which flavors are right for your budget. Check out the menu from Restaurant No. 01 and order now!

photos.photo-description: Take a look at the actual photos at the restaurant to see the space as well as the dish at the restaurant so you know what to expect on your next table reservation.

reviews.review-description: Read people's reviews of the restaurant. All reviews are written by diners who have experienced the restaurant. With real reviews, you can see what other diners love about the Restaurant and book a table with confidence!
reviews.review-empty-text: This restaurant has no reviews yet
reviews.public-review-text: The review will be open to everyone

schedule.schedule-empty-text: The restaurant does not have a reservation schedule for the day, please choose another date.
schedule.paypal-text: Pay your deposit ($5) and book your table now with PayPal

search.text-description-restaurant: Looking for the best restaurants? We'll introduce you to the best places to eat out for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Ready to discover the top restaurants? By the way, don't forget to book a table online. You risk not having a table if you don't make a reservation!
search.text-description-dish: Looking for delicious dish? We will present you the most suitable dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. By the way, don't forget to book a table online. You risk not having a table if you don't make a reservation!
search.what-handbook: Let's see what handbooks we have?
search.text-description-handbook: Looking for articles, culinary handbook? We will introduce you to interesting and useful handbooks. By the way, don't forget to book a table online. You risk not having a table if you don't make a reservation!
